name: Disco Duel (tritex)
description:
This is a PvP Twin stick shooter game where you can face off with your friends locally. The Neon drenched atmosphere has nothing to hide. Welcome to Disco Duel.

Sound track: https://soundcloud.com/user-903027433/disco-decadence-disco-duel-ost

Ps: If any bugs are found please put them in the comments
